Package renderer.pipeline

package renderer.pipeline
The 3D graphics rendering pipeline stages.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BackFaceCulling
    This stage is used by the renderer to cull from a Model's List of Primitives any Face that is "back facing".
    BackFaceCulling2
    This stage is used by the renderer to cull from a Model's List of Primitives any Triangle that is "back facing".
    Clip
    Clip a (projected) geometric Primitive that sticks out of the camera's view rectangle in the image plane.
    Clip_Line
    Clip a (projected) LineSegment that sticks out of the view rectangle in the image plane.
    Clip_Points
    Clip a (projected) Points that might stick out of the camera's view rectangle in the image plane.
    Clip_Triangle
    Clip a (projected) Triangle that sticks out of the view rectangle in the image plane.
    Model2World
    Transform each Vertex of a Model from the model's (private) local coordinate system to the (shared) world coordinate system.
    NearClip
    Clip in camera space any Primitive that crosses the camera's near clipping plane z = -near.
    NearClip_Line
    Clip in camera space any LineSegment that crosses the camera's near clipping plane z = -near.
    NearClip_Points
    Clip in camera space any Vertex from Points that crosses the camera's near clipping plane z = -near.
    NearClip_Triangle
    Clip in camera space any Triangle that that crosses the camera's near clipping plane z = -near.
    Pipeline
    This renderer takes as its input a Scene data structure and a FrameBuffer.Viewport within a FrameBuffer data structure.
    Pipeline2
    This renderer takes as its input a Scene data structure and a FrameBuffer.Viewport within a FrameBuffer data structure.
    PipelineLogger
    Methods used by the pipeline stages to log information.
    PrimitiveAssembly
    Assemble a Model's List of Primitives into a List containing only LineSegment, Points and Triangle Primitives.
    Projection
    Project each Vertex of a Model from camera coordinates to the Camera's image plane z = -1.
    Rasterize
    Rasterize a projected geometric Primitive into shaded pixels in a {FrameBuffer.Viewport.
    Rasterize_Clip_Points
    Rasterize a clipped Points into shaded pixels in a FrameBuffer.Viewport, but do not rasterize any part of the Points that is not contained in the Camera's view rectangle.
    Rasterize_Line
    Rasterize a clipped LineSegment into shaded pixels in a FrameBuffer's viewport and (optionally) gamma-encode the line at the same time.
    Rasterize_Triangle
    Rasterize a clipped, textured Triangle into shaded pixels in the FrameBuffer's viewport.
    View2Camera
    Transform each Vertex of a Model from the Camera's (shared) view coordinates to normalized camera coordinates.
    World2View
    Transform each Vertex of a Model from the world coordinate system to the Camera's view coordinate system.
